title: The Struggle of Toussaint Maheu that leads to his failure in Emile Zola's germinal
abstract: The thesis writer would like to thank God who has given her strength and guidance to finish the thesis. Her special gratitute is to her advisor, Dra. Jenny M. Djundjung, M.A., and her co-reader, Drs. Stefanus Suprayitno for valuable guidance advice and precious time to help the thesis writer in finishing her thesis. Besides that, she also thanks her beloved parents, her brothers, her sister, and her friends who had helped her in finishing the thesis. Finally the thesis writer also thanks all the teachers in The English Department, all of whom have guided her in her study.
contributors: Jenny Mochtar Djundjung (Advisor 1); Stefanus Suprayitno (Advisor 2); ANTONIUS GURITO (Examination Committee 1)
